Name: Council Members, Agency Close etc.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York City Charter in relation to agency consultations with Council Members concerning a decision to close a facility or reduce its size.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

   	Section 1. Section 203 of the New York City Charter is hereby amended by adding a new subdivision d to read as follows:
   	d.  	Included in the fair share criteria shall be the requirement that city council members be active participants in the required consultations in an agency decision to close a facility or reduce its size.  In addition, the involved agency shall respond in writing to the issues raised by the participants in such consultations prior to taking any further action. 
   	ï¿½2. 	This local law shall take effect immediately.

   	Referred to the Committee on Governmental Operations.
